it.unige.dibris.TExpRVMAS.core.decentralized

Class ConditionsFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unige.dibris.TExpRVMAS.core.decentralized.ConditionsFactory

  • public class ConditionsFactory
extends Object
    Factory to create the conditions that will be used to filter the partitions during the decentralization process
    Author:
    angeloferrando
